juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required concrete visual elements:

*   Man's facial features from image 1
*   Man's body shape (physique) from image 1
*   Man's seated pose from image 1
*   Black hooded jacket (style from image 2)
*   Tan/khaki hood lining of the jacket (style from image 2)
*   White undershirt (style from image 2, worn under the jacket)
*   Dark-colored pants (style from image 2)
*   Short, spiky hairstyle (style from image 3)
*   Ashy light brown/dark blonde highlighted hair color (color from image 3)
*   Locker room background from image 1 (including white lockers and wooden bench)
